subject: Re: Create a dynamic suite of tests
msgSnippet: ok sorry , what i mean was Run Test 1 if error System.exit(2) Run Test 2 if error run Test1 then run Test 3 Run Test 3 if error run Test1 then run Test 4 ...
messageBody:
ok sorry , what i mean was

Run Test 1 if error System.exit(2)
Run Test 2 if error run Test1 then run Test 3
Run Test 3 if error run Test1 then run Test 4
...
generate report


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Simon Chappell
<simonpeterchappell@g...> wrote:
> Isn't there a huge danger of an endless loop here?
>
>

> >
> >
> > Ok , i hope someone can help me out
> >

> >
> > ex:

> > Test 1
> > If faillure or error found - run Test 1
> > Test 2
> > If faillure or error found - run Test 1
> > Test 3
> > ...
